content: *this lovely pattern is also popular for use as a prayer shawl lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # easy triangle shawl pattern skill level easy size finished width 64 inches approx length 35 inches not including fringe homespun® article #790 3 balls crochet hook - size n-13 9 mm worked in half_double_crochet u s from the bottom point up finish with fringe *because of the texture of homespun the fringe will fray when cut if you prefer a non-frayed look you can knot the ends knit or crochet a fringe or use hairspray or fray checktm by dritz® * see 81052ad natural comfort shawl 1 for the crochet version without fringe see easy triangle shawl with fringe knit 2 for the knit version 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/natural-comfort-shawl 2 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/easy-triangle-shawl-with-fringe-knit
